title: Why Kherson, Bracing for Battle, Matters So Much to Russia and Ukraine
description: Both sides have given great weight to what happens in Kherson, a city of symbolic and strategic value, where conditions are increasingly dire for the thousands of people who remain.
dc:creator: Matthew Mpoke Bigg, Marc Santora and Carly Olson
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A Ukrainian reconnaissance unit last month in the Kherson region, where the countryâ€™s forces have advanced on territory Russia seized early in the war.
